name: The Fearsome Mapinguari
description:
The Mapinguari is a mythical creature from the Amazon rainforest. Generally he doesn't care much about protecting the forest. But nowadays, the speed the destruction is happening left him no choice.

If it doesn't work here (black screen without text), please try at this link.

This is a free software. Source code repository here:
